title: Provides for mandatory testing of breath, blood or urine in the event of a motor vehicle collision resulting in death or injury
summary: Provides for mandatory testing of breath, blood or urine in the event of a motor vehicle collision resulting in death or injury; provides immunity from civil liability for those health care providers who comply with the provisions of law requiring such testing.
